main event: Two pilots reported seeing a blue light moving at high speed near Palm Springs, California in September 1954.
interesting points: The sighting involved two aircraft pilots from different planes,The blue light was observed moving at an altitude of about 13,000 feet,The pilots reported the light moving south at an extremely high rate of speed, The sighting lasted 2 to 3 seconds, There were no exact locations provided for the light's appearance.
sighted object: a blue light in the sky
